div.style: font-family: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, Liberation Mono, monospace; color: #e5e5e5; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; white-space: pre;

foreignObject.div:
C:\Users\dev> MyCMD MyCMD 1.0.0
> dir Directory of C:\Users\dev
> echo Hello World! Hello World!
> help Available commands: dir, cd, mkdir, rmdir, copy, del, type, cls, help, exit, version
